question: Write a letter to the manager of a company which is based in a foreign country to recommend your family member for a suitable job.
text: I am Lahiru Dilshan Baduge who works as a software architect for Bileeta Pvt Ltd. This is regarding the job opportunity of your organization for an intern software developer. I can provide a fresh graduate as a recommendation for this position.

Recently, my younger brother has completed his bachelor degree at Moratuwa University. After that, he has been searching for a suitable job opportunity to start his career. Since your organization is a multi-national company, he prefered to take this chance. Firstly, I like to share some background details of him with you. He is a hard worker and an analytical thinker. He is always keen to practice new technologies and passionate about his occupation. Moreover, he has the ability to work independently and as a team.
Finally, if you give a chance to him, he will grab it his both hands. I look forward to a favourable reply from you.
